entries.text: Thank you for calling StellarTech support. Please hold while we connect you with an agent.
Hello, thank you for calling StellarTech, my name is Alex, how can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I'm calling about the Stellar X500 smart watch. I have a few questions before I decide to purchase it.
Certainly! I'd be happy to answer any questions you have. What's on your mind?
First, I'm concerned about the **battery life**. How long does it typically last with normal use?

That's a great question! With typical usage, the Stellar X500's **battery life** lasts approximately 36 hours. If you enable battery saver mode and limit some **features**, you can extend that even further, up to 48 hours.
Okay, that sounds pretty good. What about **compatibility**? I have an older Android phone. Will it work with that?

The Stellar X500 has broad **compatibility**. It's designed to work with most Android devices running Android 8.0 and above, as well as iPhones with iOS 13 and above. To be absolutely sure, you can check the detailed **compatibility** list in the **user manual** which is available on our website.
Perfect. And speaking of information, is the **user manual** easy to understand? I'm not very tech-savvy.

Absolutely! We've put a lot of effort into making the **user manual** clear and concise. It includes step-by-step instructions and helpful diagrams. Plus, it covers all the advanced **features** too, in case you want to explore them later.
Okay, good. One last thing: what kind of **warranty** do you offer?

The Stellar X500 comes with a one-year limited **warranty** that covers manufacturing defects. You can find the full details of the **warranty**, including what's covered and what's not, on our website in the support section.

This has been really helpful. I think I have all the information I need. Thanks for clarifying the **features**, **battery life**, **compatibility**, and **warranty**, and for pointing me to the **user manual**.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you so much for your help!
Great! We're happy to help. Have a wonderful day! Thank you for choosing StellarTech.
Thank you for calling StellarTech. Goodbye.
